definition: to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-

to go/to go to (a place)/(of a time etc) last/just passed/to send/to remove/to get rid of/to reduce/to be apart from in space or time/to die (euphemism)/to play (a part)/(when used either before or after a verb) to go in order to do sth/(after a verb of motion indicates movement away from the speaker)/(used after certain verbs to indicate detachment or separation)

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

sentences.english: Past participles (- ed form) for adjectives of passive or completed actions.
sentences.chinese: 过去分词表达完成或被动感觉的形容词。

sentences.english: Strewbis most commonly used in the past participle formbstrewn.
sentences.chinese: 多见于其过去分词形式。

sentences.english: Do you mean present and past participles?
sentences.chinese: 那一定是指现在分词或过去分词了。

sentences.english: The past participle used as object complement.
sentences.chinese: 过去分词用作宾语补足语。

sentences.english: Praised by the teacher, the student smiled happily.
sentences.chinese: 在此过去分词表示学生被老师表扬。

sentences.english: Do you know how to write the past participle of this irregular verb?
sentences.chinese: 你知道这个不规则动词的过去分词怎么写吗？

sentences.english: Who knows the Past Tense and the Past Participle form of this verb?
sentences.chinese: 谁知道一般过去时和这个动词的过去分词？

sentences.english: Past tense and past participle of the composition method.
sentences.chinese: 过去式和过去分词的构成方法。

sentences.english: Used with past participle to form passive voice.
sentences.chinese: 与过去分词连用，成被动态。
